user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents and I need some ideas for decorations. Can you suggest some quotes about love and marriage that I can use for the party? Also, provide me with the past 4D results for the date range from 2010-01-01 to 2010-03-31 to incorporate a fun game.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of quotes about love and marriage for decoration ideas.
Retrieve the past 4D results for the specified date range to plan a game.
